thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: SELDY
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by SELDY

author: SELDY
title: SELDY
text:
The branch manager at the Hobart airport was very patient with me as I was sorting through with my company to see if I had to pay a premium to cover any additional excess. I changed my mind several times and she had to ring up the ATM a few times as a result.
Not to mention, I was given a free car upgrade!
